newsitem.title: USA: Union Property seeks merger partner.
newsitem.headline: Union Property seeks merger partner.

text.p: Union Property Investors Inc said on Friday that it is currently negotiating for the merger of the company into a publicly traded real estate investment trust.

The company previously announced it had retained Societe Generale to explore the possibility of the company electing real estate investment trust status or merging with, or selling its assets to, a real estate investment trust.
